title: Egypt Picks Up Solar Power Banner Dropped By US President Donald Trump
description:
The Singapore-based solar manufacturer Elite Solar is among the global stakeholders rushing to fill the demand for solar power in Egypt...and in the US, too.

The post Egypt Picks Up Solar Power Banner Dropped By US President Donald Trump appeared first on CleanTechnica.
